Title: 40941 - # Fun Decorating Ideas for Your Child’s Summer Birthday Party
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 unique ideas for decorating a child’s birthday. You can give tips for lighting, themes, party favors, color coordination, etc. Feel free to throw in ideas for games or snacks that could tie into a specific décor theme. Your target audience is Southern moms who are planning their child’s birthday party. You can link to your target URL by suggesting hanging strung lights either indoors or outdoors, as a fun lighting idea.

Title: 40945 - # Unique Lighting Ideas for Your Child’s Bedroom
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 unique lighting ideas for a child’s bedroom. You can suggest ideas such as strung lights, paper lanterns, colored bulbs, novelty shaped light fixtures and more. Your target audience is moms. You can link to your target URL by suggesting using strung lights in a child’s bedroom.
